name: Chefaa Inc.
description: Developer of an on-demand medicine delivery platform designed to connect patients with local pharmacies. The company's platform utilizes artificial intelligence, GPS-enabled, data-driven app to help users order, schedule pharmacy needs, save cost, to better serve patients comprehensively for better patients' compliance with improved accessibility & affordability, thereby enabling consumers to receive medicines with minimal effort and waiting periods.
one_liner: Developer of an on-demand medicine delivery platform designed to connect patients with local pharmacies. The company's platform utilizes artificial intelligence, GPS-enabled, data-driven app to help users order, schedule pharmacy needs, save cost, to better serve patients comprehensively for better patients' compliance with improved accessibility & affordability, thereby enabling consumers to receive medicines with minimal effort and waiting periods.
